title: Two Passengers Die Simultaneously on Saudia Flight—As Bomb Threats Grip Airline Twice In Four Days
content:
On Friday, June 20, 2025, two passengers died onboard a Saudia flight to Surabaya, Indonesia. One passenger was 67 and the other 85. They both passed at almost the same exact moment, about an hour prior to landing.
